duties_responsibilities.duty: Own the design and implementation of tools that enable team members to run development tests.
Partner with customers in various industries to develop requirements and plan out test campaigns to ensure mission success.
Design, assemble, and test custom hardware, electrical, and mechanical systems for customers.
Provide mentorship and guidance to the team on technical topics and engineering best-practices.
Interpret and review data to ensure that hardware is operating as expected and assist with root cause analyses for test anomalies or failures.
Identify and integrate new test equipment into facilities and assist in growth plans and optimization within the business.
Provide meaningful contributions to clients for environmental test systems and help drive decisions for projects in a variety of different industries.
Operate and understand complex test facility systems using schematics and wiring diagrams.
Work with data acquisition systems and control systems to continually improve in-test data recording and usability of the systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree (Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Computer Science, Physics, Math, related field)
